About inPowered:inPowered’s AI platform enables brands to maximize their content marketing ROI. Powered by Artificial Intelligence and years of machine learning, their Content Intelligence and Content Distribution solutions allow marketers to collect proprietary data and use it to drive real ROI – positively changing brand perception, increasing action taken onsite, lead generation and user engagement. inPowered was founded in 2014 by Peyman and Pirouz Nilforoush after selling their previous company, NetShelter, to Ziff Davis.Description:inPowered is looking to fill our newly created position of Director, Demand Generation to help take our company’s growth to the next level. The overriding responsibility of this role is to design and hands-on execute multi-touch demand creation programs that drive pipeline creation and revenue growth. This role reports to the President & Co-Founder and will work closely with the Sales, Customer Success, and Product teams. The ideal candidate is data driven, strategic, and willing to roll-up their sleeves to get things done. It requires a candidate with strong leadership skills, creativity, and ability to thrive in an entrepreneurial culture.Responsibilities:Build-out a scalable demand generation function at inPowered that drives predictable pipeline activitySet targets for qualified leads and deliverUnderstand our customers, the reasons they buy, and the market landscape, and turn these insights into effective go-to-market strategies for acquisitionOwn development of all content on our website including our blog and ensure that inbound traffic to our website converts into leadsOwn and optimize aggressive lead generation campaigns that drive high quality leadsMaintain a feedback loop between sales & marketing to optimize lead generation campaigns and identify opportunities for pipeline acceleration and sales conversionsRequirements:5+ years’ digital marketing experience, preferably in B2B technology markets. At least 2 years being responsible for the demand generation function at a AdTech/SaaS companyExpert in digital marketing, including SEO, PPC, lead scoring, nurturing programs, list management, segmentation, and targetingStrong analytical expertise to set measurable goals and evaluate campaign effectivenessIn-depth knowledge of CRM and marketing automation systems, experience with Salesforce and Pardot is a strong assetSelf-motivated and extremely resourceful in driving projects forward.Benefits: 100% paid medical and dental insurance for employeesUnlimited vacation policy – take whenever you wantMonthly reimbursements for the commute, gym, phone, InternetPowered by JazzHRinmmMcFucQ
